payer.name: Blue Shield of California
payer.description: Identifies the healthcare insurer within the contract

provider.name: Fremont Hospital
provider.description: Identifies the healthcare provider within the contract

contract_details.description: Indicates when the contract becomes effective

service.type: Behavioral Health Services Acute Psychiatric Hospital
service.description: Describes the type of healthcare services covered by the contract

suggested_terms.TITLE: Behavioral Health Services Acute Psychiatric Hospital Agreement
suggested_terms.PAYMENT MODEL: 106% percent of the reimbursement established by the Medicare program
suggested_terms.CLAIM SUBMISSION: all Provider Services must be billed and coded in accordance with Blue Shield requirements as detailed in this Agreement and the Provider Manual
suggested_terms.CLAIMS ACCURACY: all Provider Services must be billed and coded in accordance with Blue Shield requirements as detailed in this Agreement and the Provider Manual

FINANCIAL.payment_terms: Blue Shield shall pay Hospital the following reimbursement

POLICY_COMPLIANCE.payment_policies: For Inpatient Services provided to a Member enrolled in a Blue Shield Medicare Advantage Benefit Program, Blue Shield shall pay Hospital the following reimbursement
POLICY_COMPLIANCE.clinical_guidelines: all Provider Services must be billed and coded in accordance with Blue Shield requirements as detailed in this Agreement and the Provider Manual. Blue Shield's requirements are based on nationally recognized and industry standard coding structures, including, but not limited to, the National Uniform Billing Committee, the AMA Current Procedural Terminology, the Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS), Diagnosis Related Groups (DRG), and the appropriate International Classification of Diseases (ICD) code set as indicated by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
